接口的使用
org.springframework.util.ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter

  • 使用ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.util
    Miscellaneous utility classes, such as String manipulation utilities, a Log4J configurer, and a state holder for paged lists of objects.

    • org.springframework.util中ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter的使用

      声明为ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter的org.springframework.util中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter ReflectionUtils.COPYABLE_FIELDS
      Pre-built FieldFilter that matches all non-static, non-final fields.
      参数类型为ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter的org.springframework.util中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void ReflectionUtils.doWithFields(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, ReflectionUtils.FieldCallback fc, ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter ff)
      Invoke the given callback on all fields in the target class, going up the class hierarchy to get all declared fields.
